campaign.title: Weekly Specials - Classic Knit Essentials (Feb 2, 2026)
campaign.subject: Timeless Classics: Macy, Rosy & Selma on Special
campaign.notes: Weekly specials newsletter featuring Macy Cowl Neck Top, Rosy Tie Front Cardigan, and Selma Pleated Neckline Top/Tunic. All 5.5+ year old classic patterns with proven sales history. Sale ends Sunday, February 9th, 2026.
